text: department of information technology duties of the commissioner amend rsa xviii to read as follows establishing as necessary after consultation with the information technology council established under rsa statewide standards and protocols for information technology networks telephony and cyber security which shall not be subject to the rulemaking requirements under rsa and shall be adhered to by all executive branch agencies unless granted a waiver by the commissioner administrative procedure act exemptions standards and protocols of the department of information technology rsa i gg is repealed and reenacted to read as follows gg statewide standards and protocols developed by the department of information technology in consultation with the information technology council including those adopted pursuant to rsa xviii relative to information technology networks telephony and cyber security within executive branch agencies repeal rsa xx relative to development of a telephony services manual by the department of information technology is repealed
